summary: Job post analyzer application that detects suspicious job postings using NLP and machine learning, with support for text and image inputs, email domain verification, and company information lookup
architectural_notes: Backend using Motoko instead of Flask/Python
Text and image input processing required
ML model integration needed for fake post detection
known_issues: Original request was for Flask/Python which is not supported on this platform

existing_features.title: Create a job post input interface that allows users to paste job descriptions as text and upload images of job postings
Create a company information lookup feature that searches for and displays basic information about the company mentioned in the job posting, including company name, industry, and verification status

Implement a classification system that analyzes all collected signals and classifies job postings as either 'Genuine' or 'Potentially Fake' with a confidence score and explanation of the factors that influenced the classification

Design a cohesive visual theme with professional, trust-building aesthetics using clean typography, organized layouts, and a color palette that conveys security and reliability, ensuring consistent styling throughout the analysis interface and results display
Replace the current professional trust-building color palette with a vibrant, colorful design system that uses bright, eye-catching colors throughout the application interface
Enhance visual appeal of the JobPostInput component with colorful styling including gradient backgrounds, colorful input borders, vibrant button colors, and animated hover effects
Update the AnalysisResults component to use colorful visual elements including vibrant classification badges, colorful icons, gradient backgrounds for result cards, and colorful status indicators
Redesign the AnalysisLayout header and footer with colorful branding elements including gradient backgrounds, vibrant logo styling, and colorful typography accents
Update the CompanyInfoDisplay component with colorful verification badges, industry icons with vibrant colors, and colorful card backgrounds
Configure the application for mainnet deployment with production-ready settings and canister configurations
Deploy both frontend and backend canisters to the Internet Computer mainnet network

new_feature_requests.summary: Job post input interface supporting text and image uploads
NLP and ML-based analysis to detect suspicious job posting patterns
Classification system to label posts as fake or genuine

Implement backend analysis logic to detect suspicious patterns in job postings using text analysis techniques, checking for common fraud indicators such as unrealistic salary promises, vague job descriptions, urgency tactics, requests for personal information upfront, poor grammar, and missing company details

Build an email domain verification system that extracts email addresses from job postings and validates whether the domain matches legitimate business domains versus suspicious free email providers or newly registered domains
Redesign interface with attractive, colorful styling
